TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InstanceNotFoundException extends System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationException

summary.span: 擲回的例外狀況指出提供者沒有傳回任何執行個體。

span.span: The exception thrown to indicate that no instances are returned by a provider.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 程式庫目前被視為最終狀態，針對影響這些程式庫的非安全性相關問題，不會提供進一步的開發、增強功能或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: [MI API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) 應使用於所有新的開發。

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

summary.span: 初始化 InstanceNotFoundException 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the InstanceNotFoundException class.

param.name: message
param.span: 字串，其中包含說明例外狀況之原因的錯誤訊息。

param.name: info
param.span: SerializationInfo，其中包含序列化例外狀況時所需要的所有資料。

span.span: The SerializationInfo that contains all the data required to serialize the exception.

param.name: context
param.span: StreamingContext，指定資料流的來源和目的地。

span.span: The StreamingContext that specifies the source and destination of the stream.

summary.span: 使用指定的序列化資料和資料流內容，初始化 InstanceNotFoundException 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the InstanceNotFoundException class with the specified serialization information and streaming context.

param.name: message
param.span: 字串，其中包含說明例外狀況之原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: A string that contains the error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 導致擲回目前例外狀況的 Exception。

span.span: The Exception that caused the current exception to be thrown.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the InstanceNotFoundException class with the specified error message and the inner exception.
